newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: Bank Austria Q1 oper prof 3.565 bln ats.
newsitem.headline: Bank Austria Q1 oper prof 3.565 bln ats.

text.p: Bank Austria said on Thursday first quarter group operating profit, including newly acquired Creditanstalt, stood at 3.565 billion schillings.
In a statement, the bank did not give comparative figures.
Last month Creditanstalt, which was formally taken over by Bank Austria in March, reported a record first quarter operating profit of 2.11 billion schillings.

A Bank Austria spokesman said the first quarter results published by Bank Austria on Monday included Creditanstalt earnings with the exception of a few operations that will appear only in the new group's first half results.
Bank Austria AG, the parent company, said its first quarter operating result rose to 1.395 billion schillings from 1.083 in 1996.
"The first quarter was very satisfactory," it said.

It traced the increase to an improved trading result, which jumped to 428 million schillings from 141 million, and a modest 2.7 percent increase in costs to 3.192 billion schillings. -- Janet McBride, Vienna newsroom +43-1 531 12 254
